title: R Project initialization by template.
text: goal peacock provide functions project initialization workflows using pre-build templates. Templates available R R Shiny projects.

title: R Project initialization by template.

title: R Project initialization by template.
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(peacock) ## Initialize shiny project structure init_shiny() #> You current working directory will be: #> /Users/samuelbharti/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-UAB-TheUniversityofAlabamaatBirmingham/Work/packages/peacockDo you wish to create a project template here? (y/yes to confirm):  #> Project initialization canceled.
